body:
![TubeFeed Logo](https://github.com/bouzouksis1987/TubeFeed/raw/master/TubeFeed-96.png)
### Live Tube Information
TubeFeed is one of the most popular FREE tube application for Android platform. The application is very simple and very light to serve quickly the user with live tube information.

```
TubeFeed contains useful live information about the tube lines:
- Bakerloo
- Central
- Circle
- District
- DLR
- Hammersmith & City
- Jubilee
- Metropolitan
- Northern
- Piccadilly
- Overground
- Victoria
- Waterloo & City	
```
### History
The London Underground incorporates the oldest section of underground railway in the world, which opened in 1863 and now forms part of the Circle, Hammersmith & City, and Metropolitan lines and the first line to operate electric trains, in 1890, now part of the Northern line.

The Underground system is also colloquially called the Tube. The Underground serves 270 stations and has 402 kilometers (250 mi) of track, 45 per cent of which is underground. It is the second largest metro system in the world in terms of route miles, after the Shanghai Metro and part of the largest system in terms of route miles when taken together with the Docklands Light Railway and the London Overground. It also has one of the largest numbers of stations. 

### Contributors
Special thanks to Matt Entwistle & Andrzej Jedrzejewski for their help in the graphic area especially for the app logo.

### Development
The application is developed in [PhoneGap 1.9.0](http://phonegap.com/) framework, HTML 5 with [JQuery Mobile plugins](http://jquerymobile.com/).

![PhoneGap 1.9.0](https://d3t7bkeoh402q5.cloudfront.net/phonegap128.png)
![HTML 5](http://www.w3.org/html/logo/downloads/HTML5_Logo_128.png)
![JQuery mobile](http://dynimg-de.v2bcdn.com/product_class_external_product/jquery.png)
![Javascript](http://a0.twimg.com/profile_images/2225171154/jslogo_reasonably_small.png)

### Support or Contact
We value your support of TubeFeed and would love to hear your comments. Send us an email at info@tubefeed.panayiotisgeorgiou.com
name: TubeFeed
